categories.title: Recent Updates to the Eliza Project

content.text:
The Eliza project has seen several recent updates across different areas:

**Features**:
- Added pglite support with database design improvements (PR #3598)
- Enabled fetching relevant facts in the facts provider (PR #2635)
- Replaced AgentRuntime with an interface to extend client functionality (PR #2388)

**Bug Fixes**:
- Fixed generation of structured objects and images with NEAR AI (PR #3644)
- Resolved Telegram E2E test and group chat issues (PR #3624)

**Other Improvements**:
- Stabilized the develop branch (PR #3645)
- Updated Discord link (PR #3643)
- Removed langchain dependency for text splitting (PR #3642)
- Implemented turbo optimizations (PR #2503)

categories.title: Recent Pull Requests in the elizaOS/eliza Repository

content.text:
Several pull requests have been submitted to the elizaOS/eliza repository, introducing new features and improvements:

1. PR #3638 adds Toby voice to action functionality, enhancing voice options in the system.

2. PR #3641 implements a Paradex DEX plugin (issue #3627), expanding decentralized exchange capabilities.

3. PR #3637 introduces significant database changes by adding an 'agent' table and renaming the 'user' table to 'entity', while also implementing multi-tenancy support.

4. PR #3642 removes the langchain dependency for text splitting, likely improving efficiency or reducing external dependencies.

5. PR #2731 ports trustdb to PostgreSQL (addressing issue #2634), suggesting a database migration or enhancement.

The elizaos/eliza repository showed significant activity over a two-day period. From February 22-23, 2025, there were 5 new PRs (none merged) and 1 new issue, with 9 active contributors. The following day (February 23-24, 2025) saw continued PR activity with 5 new PRs and 9 merged PRs, no new issues, and a substantial increase to 41 active contributors.
sources: From 2025-02-22 to 2025-02-23, elizaos/eliza had 5 new PRs (0 merged), 1 new issues, and 9 active contributors.
From 2025-02-23 to 2025-02-24, elizaos/eliza had 5 new PRs (9 merged), 0 new issues, and 41 active contributors.

categories.title: Issue #3639: Type Alias "Adapter" is not defined

content.text: GitHub issue #3639 was opened by user Luks3110 in the elizaOS/eliza repository. The issue reports that a type alias named "Adapter" is not defined, causing a problem in the codebase.
